DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if an exposure to light in the evening has a positive influence on physical performance regarding endurance, strength and reaction time.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Light Exposure on Exercise Performance Dependent on Chronotype.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: BMI 18 to 30 kg/m2 endurance performance >= 55 ml/min/kg peak oxygen uptake Exclusion criteria: cardiovascular disease renal dysfunction shiftworking travels over time zones in the last 4 weeks high blood pressure (systolic blood pressure >170mmHg, diastolic blood pressure >100mmHg) depression
